Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 59th overall pick, by Texas in 1970...
Injured on 8/12/1971 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Injured on 8/28/1971 with a Blister On Finger, out for 5 days...
Earned first career win on 9/18/1977...
Was selected to the 1979 Allstar game...
Traded from Texas to Pittsburgh on 7/31/1984 (Going to PIT: P T. Carroll. Going to TEX: SS B. Madlock)...
Released by Pittsburgh on 3/2/1985...
Drafted in 4th round, 62nd overall pick, by St. Louis in 1987...
Injured on 9/6/1991 with a Pulled Back Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 4/5/1993 with a Torn Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for full season...
Injured on 6/14/1994 with a Broken Ankle, out for 10 weeks...
Had first career hit on 5/9/1995, off Jose Melendez (PIT)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/15/1996, off Arthur Rhodes (PIT)...
